question_text:
Question 6
In a company, 35% of the employees drink coffee, 40% of the employees drink tea and 10% of the 
employees drink both tea adn coffee. What % of employees drink neither tea nor coffee?
(A) 25 
 
(B) 35 
(C) 40 
(D) 15
explanation_text:
Sol.
 
Given :
 
Employees drink coffee = 35%
Employees drink tea = 40%
Employees drink both tea and coffee = 10%
So from above data we can easily sketch Venn diagram,

Hence, the correct option is (B).
